dns
***


Description
===========

CLI for the DNS service. Use this CLI to manage DNS zones, records,
and other DNS resources. For more information, see Overview of the DNS
Service.


Available Commands
==================

* record

  * domain

    * delete

    * get

    * patch

    * update

  * rrset

    * delete

    * get

    * patch

    * update

  * zone

    * get

    * patch

    * update

* resolver

  * change-compartment

  * get

  * list

  * update

* resolver-endpoint

  * create

  * create-resolver-endpoint-create-resolver-vnic-endpoint-details

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

  * update-resolver-endpoint-update-resolver-vnic-endpoint-details

* steering-policy

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* steering-policy-attachment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* tsig-key

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* view

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* zone

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * migrate-from-dynect

  * update
